00033 RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::ServerList(int x, int y, int w, int h)
00034                     :Fl_Group(x, y, w, h, "Server list") {
00035 
00036   // The x coordonate of the output fields;
00037   int out=350;
00038   // The width of the multiline output fields
00039   int moWidth=(x+w)-360;
00040   // The x coordonate of the buttons
00041   int xBtn=(x+w)-110;
00042 
00043     this->box(FL_SHADOW_BOX);
00044 
00045     svrList=new Fl_Hold_Browser(x+10, y+10, 200, h-20 );
00046  
00047     floDate =new Fl_Output(out, y+10, 200, 20, "Inline since");
00048 
00049     floDescription=new Fl_Multiline_Output(out, y+30, moWidth-110, 20, 
00050                                            "Description");
00051  
00052     floIpAdress=new Fl_Output(out, y+50, 150, 20, "Ip adress");
00053     floPort =new Fl_Output(out, y+70, 120, 20, "Port");
00054     floTechNote=new Fl_Multiline_Output(out, y+90, moWidth, 60, "Tech note");
00055     
00056 
00057     Fl_Button* btnAdd=new Fl_Button( xBtn, y+10, 100, 30, "Add" );
00058     btnDel=new Fl_Button( xBtn, y+40, 100, 30, "Delete" );
00059 
00060   this->end();
00061 
00062   btnDel->deactivate();
00063 
00064   svrList->callback(cbShowServer, this);
00065   btnAdd->callback(cbAdd, this);
00066   btnDel->callback(cbDel, this);
00067 
00068   addServer=NULL;
00069   loadServerList();
00070 }

00082 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::loadServerList(){
00083   tServerList::const_iterator iter;
00084  
00085   pl= new tServerList();
00086 
00087   xmlServerList xmlPl;
00088   pl=xmlPl.getServerList();
00089   
00090   if (pl){
00091     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00092       svrList->add( (*iter)->name );
00093     }
00094   }
00095 }

00100 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::cbShowServer(Fl_Widget *w, void *f){
00101   ( (ServerList*)f )->i_cbShowServer();
00102 
00103 }
00104 
00109 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::i_cbShowServer(){
00110   tServerList::const_iterator iter;
00111 
00112   showNoneServer();
00113 
00114   // get the selected item
00115   int sel=svrList->value();
00116 
00117 
00118   // An item is selected
00119   if (sel>0){
00120     btnDel->activate();
00121     //get the text of this item
00122     const char* str= svrList->text(sel);
00123     
00124 
00125     // Iterate through the tPlayerList
00126     if (pl){
00127       for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00128         const char* tname=(*iter)->name;
00129         // If the two names are the same
00130         if(strcmp(str, tname)==0){
00131           showServer((*iter));
00132         }
00133       }
00134     }
00135   }
00136   else{ // None player is selected
00137     showNoneServer();
00138     btnDel->deactivate();
00139   }
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00147 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::showNoneServer(){
00148   floDescription->value("");
00149   floIpAdress->value("");
00150   floPort->value("");
00151   floTechNote->value("");
00152 }
00153 
00158 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::showServer(tServerListItem* i){
00159   floDate->value(i->creation.c_str());
00160   floDescription->value(i->description);
00161   floIpAdress->value(i->ipAdress);
00162   floPort->value(i->port);
00163   floTechNote->value(i->techNote);
00164 }

00170   ( (ServerList*)f )->i_cbAdd();

00178 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::i_cbAdd(){
00179 
00180   if (addServer==NULL){
00181     addServer=new AddServer(this);
00182   }
00183   else{
00184     addServer->show();
00185   }
00186 }

00192 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::refresh(){
00193   showNoneServer();
00194   svrList->clear();
00195   loadServerList();
00196 }

00201 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::cbDel(Fl_Widget *w, void *f){
00202   ( (ServerList*)f )->i_cbDel();
00203 
00204 }

00210 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::i_cbDel(){
00211  // get the selected item
00212   int sel=svrList->value();
00213 
00214 
00215   // An item is selected
00216   if (sel>0){
00217     //get the text of this item
00218     const char* svName= svrList->text(sel);
00219 
00220     // A confirmation dialog
00221     string s="Do you really want to definitly delete the server ";
00222     s+=svName;
00223     s+=" ?";
00224     int confirmation= fl_choice(s.c_str(), "Yes", "No", NULL);
00225 
00226     if (confirmation==0){ //yes
00227       xmlServerList xmlSvr;
00228       xmlSvr.delServer( svName );
00229     }
00230   }
00231 
00232   refresh();
00233 }
